title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity 

Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 2022 (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electricity cost (domestic electricity accounts) emergency measure act 2022 (commencement) order 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity
heading: 2. The 8th day of March 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 8th day of March 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
Electricity Costs (Domestic Electricity Accounts) Emergency Measures Act 
2022 (No. 1 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 March, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, 
Climate and Communications. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th March, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [104] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
